column4: please PM me if you know anything about installing maya, using the instructions found here http://www.backports.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=66859&page=16
just cd to the linux folder and use alien it's not that hard
thats what i did. using the "for i in *.rpm; do sudo alien -cv $i; done" line. but instead it just creates folders with root access only.
